lines: The light of the Holy See shines on Coerthas, and illumes it from the highest peaks to the blackest tunnels. What need we fear from dragons and unbelievers?
The Dravanians mass for an assault on our defenses, do they? Foolish lizards. They do not understand that to challenge the blessed light of the Holy See is to perish.
You have served us well, adventurer─the Temple Knights would have been hard-pressed indeed to turn back the Horde alone. Mayhap 'tis time I returned to the practice yard...
The recent revelations have driven some lowborn knights to question their place within the order.
Yet it is no simple thing to leave the Temple Knights. When principles and practical considerations are at odds, what are we to do?
I fear no Dravanian living, but their master... Nidhogg is a demon of nightmare risen from the deepest hell.

The light of the Holy See has faded, and the wyrm's shadow darkens our walls no more. Yet while lords and ladies must learn to govern alongside the commonfolk, our duty to defend Ishgard remains unchanging.

obj.n: アダマンウィングレット
モリブデンカイトシールド
テンプラーチェーンコイフ
テンプラーホーバージョン
